name: Jumpy Clash
summary:
Jumpy Clash is an intense action packed one touch game with non-stop explosive action.
Clash through geometry hurdles at great pace. You will be moving very fast and have to Colour Switch quickly to go further. Tap the jumpy ball through obstacles and be very careful. To cross the obstacle the color of ball should be the same as the color of obstacle. If the colors don’t match and you try to cross, you’ll have to start all over again. So keep an eye on the color patterns and switch color if you have to.
Dive into this simple one touch controls game to top the leaderboards.
